avataar - Key Account Manager

Location - Bangalore, Work Type: Full time

Support July 01, 2022

Job Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate effectively with the external partners and set them up for success.
  • Own the assignments/quality/duration of all external partner accounts and monitor weekly, daily productivity metrics.
  • Manage and prioritise 3D asset creation requests from multiple teams with short, frequently changing timelines.
  • Build and share best practices with the newly onboarded accounts and conduct regular refresher trainings for existing accounts.
  • Perform quantitative analysis of key process indicators to identify opportunities for process improvement.
  • Ensure that all processes are well-documented and training materials around processes are robust and up-to-date.

Job Requirements

  • 4+ years of experience in Key Account Management or Operations.
  • Minimum of 2 years of people management experience and have handled a small or large team size.
  • Must demonstrate an understanding of technical art production, willingness to learn end-to-end modelling.
  • Proven ability to meet deadlines and a high level of commitment towards deliverables.
  • Experience in working with Google Sheets/Excel.
  • Excellent communication, presentation and interpersonal skills.
